com.vividsolutions.jump.warp

Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vividsolutions.jump.warp.Triangle

  • public class Triangle
extends Object
    A triangle, with special methods for use with BilinearInterpolatedTransform.
    See Also:
    BilinearInterpolatedTransform
